pages.text: While commonly associated as pets, Scottish Terriers were originally bred for vermin hunting.$(br2)Standing under half a block tall, these sturdy dogs come in two coats.
Scottish Terriers are found most commonly in various taigas. You can also find them in forests and more rarely in birch forests.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Rabbit Treat.
